issue.title: [Docs] Enable dark mode on documentation site
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17152](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17152). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
pydata-sphinx-theme adds dark mode in version 0.9.0. We will need to adapt our logo ([see docs](https://pydata-sphinx-theme.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user_guide/configuring.html?highlight=dark#different-logos-for-light-and-dark-mode)). There are also some places in the docs where we may need to adjust additional CSS. See attached screenshot.
